isis.stitle: CAB: DAYCAB AND SLEEPER CAB for ProStar, ProStar Premium, and ProStar Limited Models - REMOVE - DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDE KICK PANEL

svcproc.title: DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDE KICK PANEL

svcsubproc.title: Remove Driver Side Kick Panel on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 94 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove one pan head torx screw (Item 1) from top of driver side kick panel (Item 2). Lay pan head torx screw out of the way and save for installation.
Remove one hex flanged head bolt (Item 3) from side of driver side kick panel (Item 2). Lay hex flanged head bolt out of the way and save for installation.
Remove one hex flanged head bolt (Item 4) from back of driver side kick panel (Item 2). Lay hex flanged head bolt out of the way and save for installation.
Slide driver side kick panel (Item 2) out from under forward portion of cab door opening scuff plate and remove it. Lay driver side kick panel out of the way and save for installation.

figure.caption: Figure 94. Driver Side Kick Panel on Daycab and Sleeper Cab

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. HEX FLANGED HEAD BOLT (M8 X 45 TYPE I)
4. HEX FLANGED HEAD BOLT (M6, 50 MM LONG)

svcsubproc.title: Remove Passenger Side Kick Panel on Daycab and Sleeper Cab
svcsubproc.para:
Refer to Figure 94
for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove one hex flanged head bolt (Item 9) from side of passenger side kick panel (Item 10). Lay hex flanged head bolt out of the way and save for installation.
Slide passenger side kick panel (Item 10) out from under forward portion of cab door opening scuff plate and remove it. Lay passenger side kick panel out of the way and save for installation.
